task: Calculate the number of detected genes (genes with at least 1 count) for each on-tissue bead in this Seeker dataset. Report summary statistics. Return a JSON object with fields: on_tissue_beads (total number of on-tissue beads), mean_genes_per_bead (mean number of genes detected per bead), median_genes_per_bead (median number of genes detected per bead), std_genes_per_bead (standard deviation of genes per bead).
